淔字的基本解释

淔
zhí
水名。
古州名。
一种植物，即“菌芝”。

淔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》恥力切，入職，徹。］
［《集韻》丞職切，入職，禪。］
(1)古水名。
(2)古代泉名。唐时湖南道州七泉之一。

淔字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淔； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页629第25
【唐韻】恥力切【集韻】蓄力切，?音敕。【說文】水也。一曰出潁川。　又草名。【爾雅·釋草】淔灌。【郭璞註】未詳。　又【集韻】丞職切，音殖。義同。

淔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
淔字的起名意思

水名。古州名。一种植物，即“菌芝”。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
zhí
Water name.
Ancient state name.
A kind of plant, namely "Mushroom Mushroom".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
["Guangyun" is shameful, entertaining, and thorough. ]
["Ji Yun" is a prime position, entry, Zen. ]
(1) Ancient water name.
(2) The name of the ancient spring. One of the Seven Springs of Hunan Province in Tang Dynasty.
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　淔; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 629 25
[Tang Yun] Shame to cut [Ji Yun] to accumulate energy to cut,? Yin Chi. [Said the text] Water also. One said out of Yingchuan.　Also cursive name. 【Erya·Shuicao】Song irrigation. [Guo Pu's Note] Unknown.　[Jiyun] Cheng Zhi cut, sound reproduction. The same meaning.
Sorrow
